ovdesc.p: This screen is used to define many-to-many relation between Message Payment Type and Channels used in the payments hub.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or reverse a record in store table, PPT.MSGPAYMENTTYPECHANNEL

desc.p: Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
Indicates the name of the channel.
Mandatory input. 1-10 alphanumeric characters. Value links to field 'ChannelName' in PPT.CHANNEL.
Used for internal purpose.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Unique identifier for the entity Payment Message Type Channel.
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the previous live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.

Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
